stories.original_headline: What scientists found inside Titan was not what anyone expected
stories.original_summary: For years, scientists thought Saturn’s moon Titan hid a global ocean beneath its frozen surface. A new look at Cassini data now suggests something very different: a thick, slushy interior with pockets of liquid water rather than an open sea. A subtle delay in how Titan deforms under Saturn’s gravity
stories.fantasy_headline: Wizards Discover Icy Slush, Not Ocean, Within Frozen Moon-World!
stories.fantasy_story: For ages, Royal Astrologers believed the distant frozen sphere of Titan held a great ocean beneath its icy crust. Now, new insights from ancient star charts suggest a different truth. Instead of an open sea, Titan hides a thick, slushy heart with many hidden pools of liquid, revealed by the celestial sphere's subtle shivers under the Great Titan's pull.

stories.original_headline: This “mushroom” is not a fungus, it’s a bizarre plant that breaks all the rules
stories.original_summary: Balanophora is a plant that abandoned photosynthesis long ago and now lives entirely as a parasite on tree roots, hidden in dark forest undergrowth. Scientists surveying rare populations across East Asian islands uncovered how its cellular machinery shrank but didn’t disappear, revealing unexpected
stories.fantasy_headline: Forest Sages Find Bizarre Root-Flower That Mimics Fungi!
stories.fantasy_story: Deep within the shadowed undergrowth, Forest Sages have discovered a peculiar root-flower, known as Balanophora, which defies all normal plant magic. Long ago, it abandoned the sun's light and now draws its life directly from the roots of ancient trees. Its inner workings have shrunken and changed in unexpected ways.

stories.original_summary: The holidays have a way of sneaking up on us. One minute you're trick-or-treating with your kids, and the next you're panic shopping in a Buc-ee's gift aisle. But it doesn't have to be that way. With the right cheat sheet, you can keep the holiday spirit high and stress levels low. Fortunately, we d
stories.fantasy_headline: A Merchant's Scroll for Stress-Free Midwinter Festival Offerings!
stories.fantasy_story: The Midwinter Festival always arrives swiftly, catching many unprepared for the giving of gifts. Fear not, for the Grand Guild of Merchants has prepared a special scroll! This guide will help all folk find the perfect wares and enchantments for their loved ones, ensuring high spirits and low worries during the festive season.

stories.original_headline: Sony’s XM5 headphones and the latest Kindle round out this week’s best deals
stories.original_summary: If you’re feeling the stress of having procrastinated on your holiday shopping — and you missed out during Black Friday and Cyber Monday — we’ve got you. We’ve found a variety of gadgets on sale that make for great gifts, many of which will ship in time for the holidays. One of the standouts is […]
stories.fantasy_headline: Great Merchant Bargains on Whispering Shells and Lore-Tablets!
stories.fantasy_story: For those who missed the Great Bazaar of Bargains, fear not! Merchants are offering wondrous new discounts on enchanted artifacts just in time for the Midwinter Festival. Discover the finest Whispering Shells of Sony Clan and the newest Lore-Tablets, ensuring swift delivery for all your festive giving needs.
